nodes.text: Balawai meatpie was a type of pie containing meat. The Human Nick Rostu once described a wound he received from a vibroshield around 22 BBY as opening him up like an overcooked Balawai meatpie. The pie shared its name with the Balawai, a group of settlers who lived on the planet Haruun Kal.
Balawai meatpie was mentioned in the 2007 novel Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight, written by Michael Reaves as the first installment of the Star Wars: Coruscant Nights trilogy.
